translation.en: I have pineapples! I have strawberry!
-I have grapes! I have grapefruit! -[bell ringing]
Hey!
We had a plan, Carter, and you done goofed it.
translation.it: Hai rovinato il nostro piano, Carter.

translation.en: The plan's still on.
The plan was for you to get me B's.
-Does this look like a freaking B? -I just want what's best for you.
translation.it: - Questa ti sembra una B? - Voglio solo il meglio, per te.

translation.en: You know when the last time I got an A was?
translation.it: Sai quant'è che non prendevo una A?

translation.en: Okay, I'll act more stupid next time.
Completely moronic and idiotic. Beyond obtuse.
translation.it: Cretino e deficiente. Ottuso come non mai.

translation.en: Yeah. Totally.
That's what I'm talking about.
You making fun of me? You're dead this time, Carter.
translation.it: Mi stai prendendo in giro? Stavolta sei morto, Carter.

translation.en: [man] What the...
-[barking] -Hey! You go on now, little mutt.
Go on. Go on, dog. I'll turn you into a hot dog. Now, go on.
translation.it: Via. Guarda che ti trasformo in un hot dog. Vattene via.

translation.en: [man] I have grapefruit!
I have pineapples! I have strawberries!
Thank you very much.
Have a nice day. Be careful with the cars.
-You, too. -Okay.
-[Carter] Hey. -[sighs] There you are.
-You're late. Again. -Come on. I wanna go to Sam's.
translation.it: - Sei in ritardo. Di nuovo. - Avanti. Voglio andare da Sam.

translation.en: I was practicing for my recital.
translation.it: Mi stavo esercitando per la recita.

translation.en: I'm gonna do five pirouettes all on my own.
translation.it: Farò cinque piroette tutte da sola.

translation.en: -It's called a solo. You know that, right? -That's cool, Frankie.
translation.it: - Si chiama assolo. Sai cos'è, vero? - Ho capito, Frankie.

translation.en: [Frankie] And I'm gonna dance in New York, in Swan Lake, and be crazy famous.
translation.it: E un giorno danzerò a New York Il lago dei cigni e sarò famosa.

translation.en: [Carter] But I'll still talk to you.
[Frankie] Why wouldn't you talk to me?
[Carter] Because famous people are always stuck up.
translation.it: Perché le persone famose sono presuntuose.

translation.en: [Frankie] I am not.
And I'm gonna wear my boots to do my pirouettes.
translation.it: E farò le mie piroette con gli stivali.

translation.en: [Carter] Good luck with that.
Hey. You are coming, right?
-To my recital? -Yeah, sure.
If you don't come and Mom has to work, nobody will be there.
translation.it: Se non verrai e la mamma dovrà lavorare, non ci sarà nessuno.

translation.en: You'll be great.
I'll be there, Frankie.
I promise.
That is if I invite you.
The tickets are for very important people only.
translation.it: I biglietti sono solo per i VIP.

translation.en: -Come on, let's get in the street car. -No, we can't!
translation.it: - Dai, prendiamo il tram. - Non possiamo!

translation.en: -You're the one who wanted to go to Sam's. -Wait, Frankie.
translation.it: - Sei tu che vuoi andare da Sam. - Aspetta, Frankie.

translation.en: -I wanna walk. -It'll be fine. Come on.
Why do you have strawberries?
What are you talking about?
I saw you have strawberries in your pocket in the car.
translation.it: Ho visto sul tram che hai delle fragole in tasca.

translation.en: [Carter] I don't have any strawberries.
[Frankie] I saw something red and green.
[Carter] I don't have any strawberries in my pocket.
translation.it: Non ho delle fragole in tasca.

translation.en: [Frankie] Well, it smeared on the chair and you didn't wipe it up.
translation.it: Si sono schiacciate sul sedile e non l'hai pulito.

translation.en: [Frankie] What do you mean you don't believe me?
translation.it: Cosa significa che non mi credi?

translation.en: [Carter] You're gonna fly to Paris to dance? Not gonna happen.
translation.it: Pensi di danzare a Parigi? Non succederà mai.

translation.en: [Frankie] It will happen. I know it.
You know you need to punch Pig-Face in the face, right?
translation.it: Devi deciderti a pestare quel Faccia da Maiale.

translation.en: -Frankie... I don't care. -He'll bully you your whole life.
translation.it: - Non mi importa. - O ti tormenterà per sempre.

translation.en: [Carter] I'm not gonna fight back. I'd lose.
[Frankie] Why are we going here again? It's just a waste of time.
translation.it: Perché torniamo qui? È solo uno spreco di tempo.

translation.en: [Carter] Because you never know, it could change sometimes.
-Maybe he's in a good mood today. -In your dreams.
translation.it: - Forse oggi è di buon umore. - Come no.

translation.en: [Carter] Hi, Mr. King. We're here for the watch.
translation.it: Salve, sig. King. Siamo qui per l'orologio.

translation.en: [Carter] $4 and 26, 27, 28 cents.
That brings the total to $34 and 18... No, 19 cents.
translation.it: Il che ci porta a un totale di 34 dollari e 18... No, 19 centesimi.

translation.en: Not bad, am I right?
-How much more do we have to go? -Oh, you don't even wanna know.
-[Frankie sighs] -[Carter] Mr. King,
we've been coming here twice a week for a long time.
translation.it: veniamo qui due volte a settimana da tanto tempo.

translation.en: You can at least take the watch out of the "For Sale" case.
translation.it: Potrebbe togliere l'orologio dagli oggetti in vendita.

translation.en: Please. He meant to say please.
translation.it: Per favore. Voleva dire per favore.

translation.en: I take it out of the case, people can't see it.
translation.it: Se lo tolgo, la gente non può vederlo.

translation.en: People can't see it, people can't buy it.
translation.it: E se non può vederlo, non può comprarlo.

translation.en: But we're gonna buy it. Eventually.
translation.it: Ma lo compreremo noi. Prima o poi.

translation.en: Listen, I told both of you when we started this whole cockamamieness,
translation.it: Quando è iniziata questa pantomima, vi ho detto

translation.en: that if somebody wants the watch, I'll let you know.
translation.it: che se qualcuno lo avesse voluto, vi avrei avvertiti.

translation.en: -Give you a chance to buy it first. -Yeah, but we should have--
translation.it: - Perché possiate comprarlo prima. - Sì, ma...

translation.en: [Sam] There's no buts.
When I bought it from your mother, I paid her good money.
translation.it: L'ho pagato profumatamente a vostra madre.

translation.en: This is a business. Barely, but it is.
translation.it: Questa è un'attività. Più o meno.

translation.en: Mr. King, I promise you'll get money. We're at, like, $34 and 19 cents.
translation.it: Sig. King, prometto che troverò i soldi. Siamo già a 34 dollari e 19 centesimi.

translation.en: -Baby, you see how old I am? -Old.
translation.it: - Secondo te quanti anni ho? - Tanti.

translation.en: A hundred?
You're not really helping your case.
translation.it: Così non aiutate la vostra causa.

translation.en: The point is, at this rate, you guys will be bringing my money to the cemetery.
translation.it: Il punto è che, a questo ritmo, mi porterete i soldi al cimitero.

translation.en: I don't like the cemetery.
Listen, a guy came in, he liked the watch. I told him it ran slow.
translation.it: È venuto un signore a cui piaceva e gli ho detto che va indietro.

translation.en: It doesn't run slow.
My father kept it in perfect condition, and you know that.
translation.it: Mio padre lo conservava in perfette condizioni e lei lo sa.

translation.en: The point is, pudding head, he's not wearing it, is he?
translation.it: Ma così, testolina, non l'ha comprato, capite?

translation.en: Mr. King, of all the people I don't like in this world,
translation.it: Sig. King, di tutte le persone che non mi piacciono,

translation.en: I like you the best.
translation.it: lei è quella che mi piace di più.

translation.en: You and every other woman in my life.
translation.it: Vale per te e per tutte le donne.

translation.en: Now, you two, get out of here.
-We're just gonna keep coming back. -Yeah, like a rash.
translation.it: - Continueremo a tornare. - Come uno sfogo cutaneo.

translation.en: -See ya tomorrow. -Take care.
-[Frankie] That was a waste of time. -No, it wasn't. We added more money.
translation.it: - È stato uno spreco di tempo. - Non è vero. Abbiamo aggiunto dei soldi.

translation.en: Next time, it'll be less money that we have to add.
translation.it: La prossima volta dovremo aggiungerne di meno.

translation.en: [Frankie] Yeah, yeah, yeah.
You've been giving Mr. King your lunch money. I know you have.
translation.it: Hai dato al sig. King i soldi del pranzo, lo so.

translation.en: [Carter] Maybe I wouldn't have to if Mom hadn't sold Dad's watch.
translation.it: Non dovrei, se mamma non avesse venduto l'orologio di papà.

translation.en: Lots of things aren't very good in life. Get used to it.
translation.it: La vita è spesso ingiusta. Abituatici.

translation.en: You get used to being grounded forever or longer when Mom finds out.
translation.it: E tu abituati a una punizione eterna, se lei lo scoprirà.

translation.en: [Frankie] I was here first.
[Carter] I'm older, so it doesn't matter. I'm always first.
translation.it: Sono più grande e non conta. Sono sempre il primo.

translation.en: Mom doesn't like it when you double dip.
translation.it: Mamma non vuole che intingi due volte.

translation.en: Mom's not here, so if you just shut your mouth for once, you'll be fine.
translation.it: La mamma non c'è. Per una volta potresti chiudere il becco.

translation.en: Fine. I can keep my mouth shut so much that I'll never talk to you
translation.it: D'accordo. Non ti parlerò mai più,

translation.en: for all the time in all the universes in all the world.
translation.it: dovesse cascare il mondo e l'universo.

translation.en: [Carter] Thank goodness.
Carter can't come to the phone right now.
translation.it: Carter al momento non può rispondere.

translation.en: Please don't leave a message after the beep. Beep!
translation.it: Non lasciate nessun messaggio dopo il bip. Bip!

translation.en: Just look!
If you are satisfied with your message, please press "1" or hang up.
translation.it: Se il messaggio vi soddisfa, premete "1" o riagganciate.

translation.en: Carter, just listen to me!
What?
No way.
I can't believe it. How did you even get up here?
translation.it: È incredibile. Come sei salito quassù?

translation.en: [Frankie] You know this dog?
[Carter] I was trying to get him to follow us home from school.
translation.it: Ho cercato di attirarlo qui dalla scuola.

translation.en: -I knew you were doing something not good. -Come on. Good boy.
translation.it: - Sapevo che stavi tramando qualcosa. - Vieni, bello.

translation.en: Come here. Good boy.
-What's your name, bud? -He's a stray.
translation.it: - Come ti chiami? - È un randagio.

translation.en: Where did you come from?
A trash can?
He smells worse than your side of the room.
translation.it: Puzza più del tuo lato della stanza.

translation.en: You're right. Let's fix it.
[folk song playing] ♪ I love my dog as much as I love you ♪
translation.it: Amo il mio cane quanto amo te

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.it: Se tu svanirai Lui sarà sempre accanto a me

translation.en: ♪ All the pay I need Comes shining through his eyes ♪
translation.it: Col suo sguardo allegro Mi fa sentire amato

translation.en: ♪ I don't need no cold water To make me realize ♪
♪ That I love my dog As much as I love you ♪
translation.it: Amo il mio cane Quanto amo te

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.it: Se tu svanirai Lui sarà sempre accanto a me

translation.en: Carter, what are we gonna do about Mom?
translation.it: Carter, come faremo con la mamma?

translation.en: What about her?
She's gonna freak out.
You asked for a bulldog for Christmas, and you got a stuffed animal.
translation.it: A Natale hai chiesto un bulldog e hai avuto un peluche.

translation.en: Which is why we're not gonna tell her. He's just gonna stay in our room for now.
translation.it: Per questo non le diremo nulla. Per ora resterà nella nostra stanza.

translation.en: Where's he gonna pee and poo?
translation.it: E dove farà cacca e pipì?

translation.en: In your bed?
Just until I can convince her.
It's Mom. We'll never convince her. Like, ever.
translation.it: È la mamma. Non riusciremo mai a convincerla. Mai.

translation.en: -Oh, crap. -Oh, no.
Hey, hey!
Where are my two favorite people that help Mom out?
translation.it: Dove sono i miei bimbi preferiti che aiutano la mamma?

translation.en: -[Carter] Hey, Mom. -Hi, Mommy!
You're the best mommy of all the mommies in all the world!
translation.it: Sei la migliore mamma di tutte le mamme del mondo!

translation.en: [Carter] Definitely, you're the best.
What'd you break?
[both] Nothing.
[Whitney] So there were four accidents today. Four!
translation.it: Oggi ci sono stati quattro incidenti. Quattro!

translation.en: I was driving the ambulance 80 miles per hour.
[Carter] That's a lot, Mom.
[Whitney] Forks on the left, hon.
-Car, is all your homework done? -[Carter] It will be.
translation.it: - Cart, hai fatto i compiti? - Li farò.

translation.en: Here you go, Madame. Mushrooms on top.
translation.it: Ecco a lei, madame. Con i funghi.

translation.en: How about you, Mr. Man. Anything exciting happen at school today?
translation.it: E a te è successo qualcosa di interessante a scuola?

translation.en: Pig-Face happened.
Your death is about to happen.
[Whitney] Again? That's the third time. Okay, that's it. I'm calling the school.
translation.it: Di nuovo? È la terza volta. Ora basta. Chiamo la scuola.

translation.en: Don't blow this up like you blow everything up.
translation.it: Non ingigantire la cosa come fai sempre.

translation.en: I'm not blowing anything up.
I wanna know who this kid is.
I told you, Pig-Face.
-Can you butt out, Frankie? -Carter, what happened? Tell me the truth.
translation.it: - Vuoi smetterla, Frankie? - Carter, cos'è successo? Dimmi la verità.

translation.en: -Carter, just-- -You don't wanna know the truth.
translation.it: - Carter... - Meglio se non la sai.

translation.en: -[Carter whispers] No. -[Whitney] Straight up, Carter.
-Are you scared of this kid? -No.
translation.it: - Questo bimbo ti fa paura? - No.

translation.en: [Whitney] 'Cause if you are, that's nothing...
-Go. -...to be ashamed of.
-[Whitney] Just let me help you. -[chuckles] No. No.
Here you go. No mushrooms.
Um, actually, can I have mushrooms, please?
-You hate mushrooms. -But taste buds change every seven years.
translation.it: - Ma tu li odi. - Le papille cambiano ogni sette anni.

translation.en: -That's a scientific fact. -He's right. Very, very right.
[Whitney] Mushrooms.
Okay.
I'm just worried about you, Carter.
-You're worried about everything. -That is not true.
translation.it: - Tu ti preoccupi di tutto. - Non è vero.

translation.en: Okay, maybe that is a little bit true. A little bit.
translation.it: D'accordo, forse un po' lo è.

translation.en: Anyway, here you go.
What is going on with you guys?
-Nothing. -Nothing.
I feel like you're hiding something from me.
Okay. Mom, let's just calm down and eat our food.
-[sighs] -Okay, I...
I know that things have been hard,
and you guys wake up in the morning and I'm already at work,
translation.it: che la mattina vi alzate e io sono già al lavoro

translation.en: and you've been on your own a lot lately.
translation.it: e che spesso vi lascio soli,

translation.en: But I just want you to know that you can talk to me, you know?
translation.it: ma voglio che sappiate che potete parlare con me, capito?

translation.en: Really, I'm right here. [chuckles]
We do talk to you, Mom.
Don't worry.
We love you, Mom, to the moon and back.
translation.it: Ti vogliamo bene, mamma. Te ne vogliamo un mondo.

translation.en: To the moon and back.
[Carter] This is the Aitken Basin, formed 4.5 billion years ago,
translation.it: Questo è il Bacino Aitken, formatosi 4,5 miliardi di anni fa.

translation.en: which in dog years is a lot.
My dad showed it to me on an electron telescope
translation.it: Mio padre me l'ha mostrato con un telescopio

translation.en: at the planetarium he ran.
Wanna know something more interesting?
translation.it: Vuoi sapere una cosa più interessante?

translation.en: This is my favorite ballerina book. Isn't she pretty?
translation.it: Questo è il libro che preferisco. Non è bellissima?

translation.en: -Hey, stop chewing on that. -[whines]
And this is the Nutcracker.
It's about an evil rat king.
translation.it: Parla di un re topo crudele.

translation.en: -Die, Rat King, die. -[barks]
Mom will hear you.
Hey, what if we named him Michael Jordan?
translation.it: Ehi, e se lo chiamassimo Michael Jordan?

translation.en: That's the dumbest name for a dog I've ever heard.
translation.it: È un nome stupido per un cane.

translation.en: Okay. What about Copernicus?
What is going on in your mind? No.
This is my favorite, Sleeping Beauty. There's a lot of kissing.
translation.it: Questo è il mio preferito. La bella addormentata. Ci sono tanti baci.

translation.en: [Carter] Look, Benjamin Franklin had a dog.
translation.it: Guarda, Benjamin Franklin aveva un cane.

translation.en: He thought they were more reliable than people.
translation.it: Li trovava più affidabili delle persone.

translation.en: That's not very interesting.
Yeah, but what about Benjamin, as his name?
translation.it: Sì, ma se lo chiamassimo Benjamin?

translation.en: Mmm... What about Benji?
He does look kind of like a Benji. He's old and new at the same time.
translation.it: Sì, gli si addice. È vecchio e nuovo allo stesso tempo.

translation.en: -[Frankie] Yeah. -[whines softly]
Good boy. Good boy.
[Carter] Dad would let us keep Benji.
I don't wanna say goodbye to Benji.
translation.it: Non voglio dover dire addio a Benji.

translation.en: I don't like goodbye.
Promise me we won't have to.
Hey, I promise you, Fritter.
[Frankie] I love you, guys.
[Carter] I love you too, Frankie.
[Frankie] And now I lay me down to sleep,
translation.it: E ora che a letto sto per andare,

translation.en: I pray the Lord for this dog to keep.
translation.it: prego il Signore che il cane possa restare.

translation.en: And that I will do incredible at my recital.
translation.it: E di essere bravissima alla recita.

translation.en: And that my spelling teacher will quit her job forever and never come back.
translation.it: E che la mia insegnante di grammatica vada in pensione e non torni più.

translation.en: And that Mommy will not have to worry so much.
translation.it: E che la mamma non debba più preoccuparsi tanto.

translation.en: And that I'll never have to eat any more mushrooms as long as I live.
translation.it: E di non dover più mangiare funghi per il resto della vita.

translation.en: Good night, Benji.
[Whitney] I don't know what to do, you know?
They're getting so big, and they're so smart,
and they catch on to things and...
And I'm trying to keep everything together.
translation.it: Sto cercando di gestire tutto quanto.

translation.en: It's like I'm nothing but a nag.
All of a sudden, I'm so serious.
Every day I feel like I'm messing them up and letting them down.
translation.it: Ogni giorno ho la sensazione di sbagliare e deluderli.

translation.en: I don't know how to be in three places at once.
translation.it: Non posso essere in tre posti contemporaneamente.

translation.en: So, feel free to give me some advice
or one of your lame science jokes, or...
translation.it: o anche una stupida battuta scientifica...

translation.en: a carton of ice cream and bingeing...
translation.it: ...o un barattolo di gelato da divorare.

translation.en: 'cause I could really use it. [sniffles]
[Whitney] Just a quick kiss before I go to work.
translation.it: Un bacio veloce prima di andare al lavoro.

translation.en: -Carter? -Good morning, Mom.
What is that?
A stuffed animal. [stammers] An animatronic one.
[sighs] Okay. All right. I'm on to you two.
This is why you guys were being weird last night.
translation.it: Ecco perché ieri sera eravate così strani.

translation.en: He's cute. Mom, look at him.
[sighs] You know what? I expected Carter to lie to me
translation.it: Da Carter mi aspetto delle bugie

translation.en: because he's almost a teenager, but you?
translation.it: perché è quasi un adolescente, ma tu?

translation.en: Mom, we're not lying. We just didn't tell you yet.
translation.it: Mamma, non abbiamo mentito. Non te l'avevamo ancora detto.

translation.en: Where did he come from?
Uh, he kind of found me.
On the street, we saved him.
[Whitney] On the street?
No. Okay.
-[whimpers] -All right, I got it.
You're cute, but you are a dog and you poop everywhere,
translation.it: Sei carino, ma sei un cane e fai cacca ovunque,

translation.en: and you mess everything up, you chew on things,
translation.it: crei disordine e mastichi le cose.

translation.en: you keep us up at night.
He loves you, Mommy.
No. Okay? I can barely keep the three of us afloat.
translation.it: No. Riesco a malapena a tenere a galla noi tre.

translation.en: It's not happening.
Mom, you don't have to worry. We'll take care of him.
translation.it: Mamma, non devi preoccuparti. Baderemo noi a lui.

translation.en: I don't have the money or the time.
translation.it: Non ho né i soldi né il tempo.

translation.en: It's not happening. I'm taking him to a shelter.
They murder-kill dogs there. You can't take him there.
translation.it: Al canile uccidono i cani. Non puoi portarcelo.

translation.en: -No, they don't. -[Carter] Are you kidding me?
A shelter?
They won't even give him three days.
I won't let them hurt him.
translation.it: Non lascerò che gli facciano del male.

translation.en: [Carter] Yeah, you will. You don't care.
translation.it: Sì, invece. Perché non ti importa.

translation.en: He's a good boy, and you won't even give him a chance.
translation.it: È buono, ma non vuoi neanche dargli una chance.

translation.en: Carter, no, okay?
I'm sorry... I don't...
I can't take care of one more thing right now.
translation.it: Non posso occuparmi di un'altra cosa.

translation.en: He's not a thing. He's Benji.
translation.it: Lui non è una cosa. Si chiama Benji.

translation.en: You named him?
I'm so sorry that you can't handle one more thing right now,
translation.it: Mi dispiace che tu non possa gestire altre cose,

translation.en: but what about us?
We take care of each other,
so I'm pretty sure that we can handle a dog.
translation.it: e potremmo gestire anche un cane.

translation.en: Maybe he'll make things fun around here for once.
translation.it: Forse potrebbe rallegrare un po' questa casa.

translation.en: Oh, I forgot. That's not allowed, either.
Carter, no... That's not fair.
-Just leave us alone. -[Benji whines]
I don't even like that stupid dog.
translation.it: Neanche mi piace quello stupido cane.

translation.en: Mom won't let you stay.
You'll wind up in a pound.
Just go.
Go, please.
I love you, Benji.
[melancholy song playing] ♪ If your heart believes in dreamin' ♪
translation.it: Se il tuo cuore ama sognare

translation.en: ♪ There's no other place I know ♪
♪ Well, life here rolls on by Without a care for tomorrow ♪
translation.it: La vita qui va avanti Senza pensare al domani

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, that was the life for me That was the life for me ♪
translation.it: Sì, quella era la mia vita Quella era la mia vita

translation.en: ♪ How long must I travel On this journey? ♪
translation.it: Per quanto deve continuare questo viaggio?

translation.en: ♪ Guess I'll count a million stars Along the way ♪
translation.it: Conterò un milione di stelle Lungo la strada

translation.en: ♪ And every time I start to worry ♪
♪ Something whispers in my ear ♪
♪ Says the words I long to hear ♪
translation.it: Dicendomi le parole che speravo di sentire

translation.en: ♪ Almost home ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ Might be lost and afraid ♪
♪ But I'm just a dream away ♪
translation.it: Ma ho quasi coronato il mio sogno

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ Just one more mile And I'll be home free ♪
translation.it: Ancora un po' di strada E sarò finalmente a casa

translation.en: ♪ Just one more day Is all my heart needs ♪
translation.it: Al mio cuore basta solo un giorno

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get there ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm gonna get there someday ♪
♪ Feel so cold and alone But I'm... ♪
translation.it: Sono infreddolito e solo Ma sono...

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
-[Frankie] Did you not eat lunch again? -[Carter] I ate lunch.
translation.it: - Hai di nuovo saltato il pranzo? - No.

translation.en: -Then how come you got more money for Sam? -I don't.
translation.it: - Dove hai trovato i soldi per Sam? - Non li ho.

translation.en: Then how come we're going to Sam's?
translation.it: E come mai andiamo da lui?

translation.en: To get my money back.
If you get our money back, how do we get Dad's watch back?
translation.it: Ma così non ricompreremo l 'orologio di papà.

translation.en: Mom doesn't care. She wouldn't let us keep Benji.
translation.it: Alla mamma non importa. Non ci ha fatto tenere Benji.

translation.en: Why should I care about getting her the watch back?
Because we're a family.
[sighs] Whatever.
You're just scared of somebody else buying it.
translation.it: Hai solo paura che qualcun altro lo compri.

translation.en: I'm not scared. I'm realistic, Frankie.
translation.it: Io non ho paura. Sono realistico, Frankie.

translation.en: I told you she wouldn't let us keep him.
translation.it: Lo dicevo che l'avrebbe mandato via.

translation.en: You're not real or listic or whatever. You're just chicken.
translation.it: Tu non sei reale o istico. Sei solo un coniglio.

translation.en: You give up at everything when not very good things happen.
translation.it: Sei subito pronto a mollare quando le cose si mettono male.

translation.en: -Mr. King, we need to talk. -...hold up.
Hey, you kids, I sold the watch.
You two go on back home now.
-You what? -Sold the watch.
You sold the watch? That's not right.
translation.it: Lo ha venduto? Ma non è giusto.

translation.en: -Y'all go on now. Go home. -You know what?
translation.it: - Andate a casa subito. - Sa che le dico?

translation.en: I'm gonna call the police and tell them you are a lying liar.
translation.it: Ora chiamo la polizia e dico loro che è un bugiardo.

translation.en: You can't sell the watch.
-How y'all doing? -[both gasp]
Now, I remember being a kid.
I used to tell my brother there I was gonna beat him with a baseball bat,
translation.it: Dicevo a mio fratello che l'avrei picchiato con una mazza,

translation.en: but I didn't really mean it.
When you say you're gonna go get the police,
translation.it: Quando dite che chiamerete la polizia,

translation.en: that's just you being a kid, right?
translation.it: anche voi non dite sul serio, vero?

translation.en: [shudders] Yeah, just talking.
translation.it: Sì, l'ho detto tanto per dire.

translation.en: Good, but just in case, y'all are gonna stick around for a while.
translation.it: Bene, ma, per non rischiare, resterete qui con noi per un po'.

translation.en: [Sam] Man, you don't need to handle kids like that.
-[Syd] Shh. -[Carter] Let go.
[Sam] You don't have to do that. Leave 'em alone!
translation.it: Non c'entrano niente. Lasciali in pace!

translation.en: [Syd] Open the safe. Fill the bag. Do it.
translation.it: Apri la cassaforte e riempi la borsa.

translation.en: -Not until you let them kids go. -Mr. Pawn Man,
translation.it: - Prima lasciali andare. - Sig. Banco dei Pegni,

translation.en: put yourself in the shoes of two fellas who would come in here wearing
translation.it: mettiti nei panni di due tizi che entrano in un negozio

translation.en: these ridiculous masks. Do I look like I'm playing?
translation.it: con due maschere assurde. Non sto giocando!

translation.en: Open the safe! Hurry up.
Y'all calm down.
-Open up the safe, now! -Don't hurt them kids.
translation.it: - Apri la cassaforte! - Non fare male ai bambini!

translation.en: Do it, before I hop that counter
and slap the taste out your mouth. Come on, hurry up!
translation.it: e te la faccio aprire a suon di pugni!

translation.en: Speed it up. Come on!
[Sam] Comin'.
You got what you came for. Now go on.
Tie him up. Let's go.
Move. Come on, back door.
-[Sam] Man, wait. -Tie him up.
-Where you taking them kids? -Move! The backdoor. Go. Get out.
translation.it: - Dove stai portando i bambini? - Presto! La porta sul retro. Fuori.

translation.en: Sit down. Sit down. Sit down.
[Carter grunts] Let us go.
Y'all gonna sit here, stay quiet for ten minutes,
translation.it: Ora ve ne starete qui per dieci minuti

translation.en: and then forget any of this ever happened.
If you don't, me and my brother will pay a little visit to your home. Understand?
translation.it: Se non lo fate, io e mio fratello verremo a trovarvi a casa, capito?

translation.en: -[grunts] Help! -Hurry up.
-[Sam] Over here! -Mr. King!
[Carter] Frankie, stop!
Get up. Get up.
-[Frankie] Help! Help us! -[Carter] Let us go!
-[Syd] Get in the van. -[Frankie] Carter? [screams]
-[Titus] Wait. What are you doing? -They saw my face.
translation.it: - Cosa fai? - Mi hanno visto in faccia.

translation.en: -Help! Someone, help us! -[Titus] They kids.
Now they've seen your face, too. Get in the van.
translation.it: Ora hanno visto anche te. Sali.

translation.en: Please let us go.
-We didn't do anything. -Go on. Get in the van.
translation.it: - Non abbiamo fatto nulla. - Salta su.

translation.en: Please.
Help! Help!
Damn.
Is that your dog?
-[man] Easy! -[horn blaring]
Get out the way!
-You get this is kidnapping, right? -It's more like saving our butts.
translation.it: - Lo sai che è rapimento, vero? - Ci sto salvando la pelle.

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -Find the phone, Titus. Hurry up.
-Mommy! -Get rid of it.
-Get it out the window, idiot. -I'm getting it! [grunts]
translation.it: - Buttalo fuori dal finestrino, idiota. - Lo sto facendo!

translation.en: [Titus] Please stop.
[Syd] We in too deep now, brother. We can't do that.
translation.it: Ci siamo troppo dentro. Non possiamo.

translation.en: He's gone.
-[Titus] Stop driving! -We can't stop!
-[Titus] We can stop! -No, we can't!
[Titus] Syd, where are you taking us?
[Syd] Don't worry. I got this covered, I promise.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti. Ho pensato a tutto.

translation.en: Why are you so ugly?
Wanna say that again?
Hey! What are you doing back there?
Nothing. It's just my lunch.
translation.it: Niente. È solo il mio pranzo.

translation.en: -[Titus] What is that? -Do not take your eye off of him.
Don't you never call me ugly. Never!
translation.it: Non dire mai più che sono brutto. Mai più!

translation.en: Hurry up. Hurry up. Hurry up.
Tie 'em up in that back room.
-[Syd] Hurry up. -[Carter grunts] Let me go!
-Double knots. Put the tarp on the van. -[Titus] They ain't going anywhere.
translation.it: - Doppio nodo. E copri il furgone. - Non andranno da nessuna parte.

translation.en: Give me your hands.
Please.
I'm almost done with my shift, and I haven't heard from you guys.
translation.it: Ho quasi finito il turno e non mi avete chiamata.

translation.en: I know that you're mad at me, but you have to tell me where you are.
translation.it: So che siete arrabbiati con me, ma dovete dirmi dove siete.

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry.
And I love you.
So call me, okay?
What'd you pick this place for? Gives me the creeps.
translation.it: Perché hai scelto questo posto? Mi dà i brividi.

translation.en: So nobody comes sniffing around.
-What're you doing, man? -Checking our score.
translation.it: - Che stai facendo? - Controllo il bottino.

translation.en: I mean with them. I didn't sign up for no kidnapping.
translation.it: Intendo con loro. Io non volevo rapire nessuno.

translation.en: Let me make something real clear to you.
There are people that want money from us,
translation.it: Dobbiamo dei soldi a della gente,

translation.en: but we ain't got no money, do we?
So they gonna break every bone in our body instead.
translation.it: Così loro ci spezzeranno tutte le ossa.

translation.en: That what you signed up for?
I don't owe those people nothing. That's all you.
translation.it: Io non devo niente a nessuno. Il debito è tuo.

translation.en: Who took care of you seven years, huh?
translation.it: Chi si è occupato di te per sette anni?

translation.en: Food, clothes, all that?
I was the one who figured out a way
for us to keep on even when our own parents wouldn't.
translation.it: di campare anche senza l'aiuto dei nostri genitori.

translation.en: What I owe, you owe.
-All right. So what's the plan? -Sell all this, pay off our debt.
translation.it: - Bene. Quindi qual è il piano? - Vendere la roba e saldare il debito.

translation.en: Keep them around in case we need a get-out-of-jail-free card.
translation.it: I bambini faranno da garanzia per non finire dentro.

translation.en: And then what?
And then we no longer need 'em.
translation.it: E poi non ci serviranno più.

translation.en: She's cold.
[Syd] So what?
-So what? -I like this here watch.
translation.it: - E allora? - Mi piace questo orologio.

translation.en: A lot.
It actually reminds me of a watch my daddy had.
translation.it: Mi ricorda un orologio di mio padre.

translation.en: Give it back!
Was this the reason y'all was in the shop today?
translation.it: È per questo che oggi eravate al negozio di pegni?

translation.en: "To the man of my dreams.
I love you more than the moon and the stars.
translation.it: Ti amo più della Luna e delle stelle.

translation.en: Love, W." That's nice.
Let me work this here.
Your daddy run off. Got sick and tired of you, your old mama.
translation.it: Vostro padre è scappato. Si era stufato di voi e di vostra madre

translation.en: So she sold it. It's good riddance.
translation.it: e lei ha venduto il suo orologio.

translation.en: But then, y'all want a little something something to remember him by.
translation.it: Ma voi volevate qualcosa che vi ricordasse il vostro vecchio.

translation.en: Ain't that right, little man?
Tell me how bad you want it.
Come on. Tell me.
It's yours, ain't it?
You can take it from me.
Take it. Take it.
Yeah.
What you scared of?
You're a little coward, huh?
Just like your old man.
Sic, Rott! Sic him!
-[Titus] We okay? -You, too, dumbo.
translation.it: - Tutto bene? - Vai anche tu, idiota.

translation.en: Go. Go!
Hey!
Dumb move, dog.
Where are you?
-[barks] -Hey!
Help!
Day keeps getting better.
Little doggie.
Where you at, baby boy?
Come out and play.
Little doggie.
Where are you?
I'm gonna skin you alive.
Gonna wipe that stupid grin off your face.
translation.it: Ti toglierò quello stupido ghigno dal muso.

translation.en: Where you at?
Come here, boy. Get this. Please, get this.
translation.it: Vieni qui, bello. Liberaci, per favore.

translation.en: Good boy.
I hate that dog!
-[Carter] Please, Benji, hurry. -It's stuck. He can't get it.
translation.it: - Ti prego, Benji, sbrigati. - Non ce la fa.

translation.en: -[Carter] Please, Benji. -Come on!
-[gasps] -Where is he?
[Syd] Oh, I think Rottie smells him.
-Where could he be? -[both gasp]
-Get him, Rott. -[Carter] No!
Run, Benji, run!
-[growling] -[Carter] Don't hurt him!
Run, Benji!
[Sam] Help! Get me out of here.
Hey, who is that?
-[panting] -Is that a dog?
What are you doing in here?
Puppy, bark for me!
Where'd you go, puppy? Come on, puppy.
Where'd you go? I know you're out there.
translation.it: Dove sei andato? So che sei lì fuori.

translation.en: What are you doing out there?
Come on, puppy. Come on, puppy. Come on.
Hey, puppy, come on back now.
What're you...
Are you trying to get the lock?
translation.it: Stai cercando di aprire la porta?

translation.en: Come on, puppy, you can do it! I know you can.
translation.it: Avanti, puoi farcela! So che puoi.

translation.en: Come on, pup. Don't leave me now. Don't give up, puppy.
translation.it: Avanti, bello. Non lasciarmi ora. Non mollare.

translation.en: Come on, baby. I know you can do it. Come on, puppy. You almost got it. Get it.
translation.it: Forza, piccolo. So che puoi farcela. Ci sei quasi, dai.

translation.en: Come on, pup. Come on, I know you can do it.
Puppy, thank you! You opened the door!
translation.it: Grazie mille, bello! Hai aperto la porta!

translation.en: Yes, yes, hey. Good boy.
Wait. Where's Carter and Frankie?
translation.it: Aspetta. Dove sono Carter e Frankie?

translation.en: [Lyle] Yes, sir. I'll keep you posted. Yeah.
Sam King? Sam King?
Detective Lyle Burton. How you doing?
-Hey. Listen. You got to find the kids. -Trust me, we're gonna find them.
translation.it: - Ascolti. Deve trovare i bambini. - Li troveremo, vedrà.

translation.en: Did you see what the guys look like?
-No, they were wearing-- -I got something.
Okay. Hold on for a second, okay? What you got? What you got?
I found it out back.
-Sam! Where's Frankie and Carter? -[Sam] Lord, Ms. Hughes, I'm so sorry.
translation.it: - Sam! Dove sono Frankie e Carter? - Mi dispiace tanto, sig.ra Hughes.

translation.en: -What happened? -Ms. Hughes, I'm Detective Lyle Burton.
-We're gonna do everything we can-- -Why were they even here?
translation.it: - Faremo il possibile... - Cosa ci facevano qui?

translation.en: -It's the watch. -The watch?
Your husband's watch.
The kids have been coming in every day almost trying to buy it back.
translation.it: I bambini venivano qui ogni giorno. Volevano ricomprarlo per lei.

translation.en: I told them that I sold it. I didn't know that they'd come in here to...
translation.it: Gli avevo detto di averlo venduto, ma non credevo sarebbero venuti...

translation.en: -Hey! What... -Get him. What...
-What is he doing here? -That dog saved me.
translation.it: - Cosa ci fa qui? - Quel cane mi ha salvato.

translation.en: -Is he yours? -No. What... He what?
He got me out of the dang closet they locked me in.
translation.it: Mi ha tirato fuori dal ripostiglio dove mi avevano chiuso.

translation.en: [Lyle] We need to follow procedure, okay?
[Sam] I think he's trying to tell you something.
Ms. Hughes! Ms. Hughes!
Stay put. Requesting backup. I got a 2-12 on foot.
translation.it: Voi restate qui. Chiedo rinforzi. Ho un 2-12 in fuga.

translation.en: [woman on radio] Suspect identification?
Uh, brown hair, 35 pounds, four legs.
translation.it: Pelo marrone, circa 15 kg, quattro zampe.

translation.en: You wanna repeat that, Burton?
Not especially.
[woman] We're parked down there.
[Lyle] Ms. Hughes, let me do my job.
I'm following that dog.
[Lyle] Listen, we'll find them.
-We will follow the dog. Just come on. -Fine. Let's go.
-Hey, hold up, hold up. -[Whitney] Sam?
About to catch a heart attack.
Get in the car. Let's go!
Hey, hey. No, no, no, you wait. Wait here. I got it.
translation.it: Ehi. No. Aspetti qui. Ci penso io.

translation.en: Must be out of my doggoned mind.
The heck you sniffing around for?
What you got?
What? What is that?
Pudding? Does it look like I want pudding?
translation.it: Budino? Ti sembra che io voglia un budino?

translation.en: -[barks] -What will I do with that?
Is that why you brought us here?
translation.it: Ci hai portati qui per quello?

translation.en: Okay. [sighs]
And then you walk off. Great.
translation.it: E ora te ne vai. Magnifico.

translation.en: Stop. Just stop.
No, stop. Just stop!
Do you have any idea how much time I've wasted?
translation.it: Hai idea di quanto tempo mi hai fatto perdere?

translation.en: My kids are... [sighs]
I don't wanna see you ever again. Go.
translation.it: Non voglio vederti mai più. Vattene.

translation.en: Do you hear me? Go!
What the heck were you thinking, Street? We got procedure, son.
translation.it: Che diavolo ti è venuto in mente? Abbiamo una procedura.

translation.en: Sir, I know. I got carried away.
Ms. Hughes? Here's a cup of jasmine tea. It manifests good fortune.
translation.it: Sig.ra Hughes. Una tazza di tè al gelsomino. Porta fortuna.

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
How much money had they saved up?
translation.it: Quanti soldi avevano messo da parte?

translation.en: It doesn't matter. I should've given them the watch back.
translation.it: Non importa. Avrei dovuto ridare loro l'orologio.

translation.en: No, I never should have sold it.
I should've done something
so they didn't think that buying a watch would make it all okay.
translation.it: affinché non pensassero che comprare un orologio avrebbe sistemato le cose.

translation.en: The honest truth is, Ms. Hughes...
I didn't give the watch back, 'cause I like having 'em come in.
translation.it: è che non gliel'ho ridato perché mi faceva piacere vederli.

translation.en: Those two, they got nothing but love in 'em.
-I got something. -It's Carter's.
translation.it: - Ho qui qualcosa. - È di Carter.

translation.en: A traffic cop found it.
No usable prints, but it's a starting point, location-wise.
translation.it: Non ci sono impronte, ma è un inizio per poterli localizzare.

translation.en: Hey, come on. Give me my phone back.
Don't eat the rubber ducky. Give me that back. Good boy. Good boy.
translation.it: Non mangiare la paperella. Ridammelo. Bravo, bello.

translation.en: -Who's a good boy? -[Frankie] What's his name, anyways?
[Carter] I don't think he has one. He's a stray.
translation.it: Non credo abbia un nome. È un randagio.

translation.en: Hey, where did you come from, buddy? Do you need a home?
translation.it: Ehi, da dove vieni, bello? Ti serve una casa?

translation.en: [Frankie] What are you thinking? What if Mom finds out?
translation.it: Sei impazzito? E se la mamma lo scopre?

translation.en: [Carter] I'm thinking he's lonely.
[Carter] What are we gonna name him?
[Frankie] Like there's even a reason to name him. Mom will never let us keep him.
translation.it: È inutile cercargli un nome. La mamma non ce lo farà mai tenere.

translation.en: [Carter] It's kind of like...
when Dad got sick, Mom did, too.
translation.it: quando papà si è ammalato, si fosse ammalata anche lei.

translation.en: [Frankie] I miss Dad, but I miss Mom even more.
translation.it: Mi manca papà, ma mi manca ancora di più la mamma.

translation.en: [Carter] I know, Fritter. I know.
[somber song playing] ♪ When the road gets dark ♪
translation.it: Quando la strada si fa scura

translation.en: ♪ And you can no longer see ♪
translation.it: E non vedi più nulla davanti a te

translation.en: ♪ Just let my love throw a spark ♪
translation.it: Lascia che il mio amore Cancelli ogni paura

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.it: Abbi un po' di fiducia in me

translation.en: ♪ When the tears you cry ♪
♪ Are all you can believe ♪
♪ Just give these lovin' arms a try Baby ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.it: Abbi un po' di fiducia in me

translation.en: ♪ And when your back's against the wall ♪
translation.it: Quando ti senti messo al muro

translation.en: [man] Hey, dog!
♪ Just turn around and you will see ♪
♪ I will catch you I will catch your fall, baby ♪
translation.it: Che io sarò lì E non ti lascerò cadere

translation.en: ♪ Just have a little faith in me ♪
translation.it: Abbi un po' di fiducia in me

translation.en: [Syd] Come on, what'd I tell you? Hear me, boy?
translation.it: Avanti, cosa vi ho detto? Forza!

translation.en: -We'll get out of here. -I don't wanna go anymore.
Look at my face. See how much I care?
Go on. Come on, Titus. Let's go.
Uh... What are we doing, man?
Listen. I know a guy, all right?
He's gonna buy our score and take us up river.
translation.it: Comprerà la merce e ci farà risalire il fiume.

translation.en: [Titus] I mean, with them.
They're coming with us. Come on.
What are you saying?
Don't worry your pretty little head about it.
What y'all doing over there?
-Nothing. -Nothing.
Nothing.
-Ain't we clever? -[barking]
No, please. No.
-No, please, please. -Please. Please.
Let me be real clear...
I don't need but one of y'all to be my insurance policy. You hear me?
translation.it: Mi basta uno di voi come lasciapassare, capito?

translation.en: Get goin'. Go on.
-Ms. Hughes... -I have to go find my kids.
translation.it: - Sig.ra Hughes... - Devo trovare i miei figli.

translation.en: -Just give me a second. -I can't just sit here any longer.
translation.it: - Mi dia un secondo. - Non me ne starò ferma qui.

translation.en: -I have to go. -You have to be rational.
Ms. Hughes! I have a lead.
What?
This van. It was stolen two days ago.
translation.it: Questo furgone. È stato rubato due giorni fa.

translation.en: -And you think that they're in there? -Yeah.
translation.it: - E crede siano lì dentro? - Sì.

translation.en: It raced out of the quarter down towards the river.
That's right where the dog was taking us.
translation.it: Ma è dove ci ha condotti il cane.

translation.en: -It's just a coincidence. -How is that a coincidence?
translation.it: - È una coincidenza. - Non direi proprio.

translation.en: -Listen, the house was empty. -Maybe you didn't look hard enough.
translation.it: - La casa era vuota. - Forse non ha cercato bene.

translation.en: You're talking as if you think a dog is smarter than the police.
translation.it: Per lei quel cane è più intelligente della polizia?

translation.en: I'm going back to the house.
We need to follow protocol this time!
I don't think that dog was following any kind of protocol.
translation.it: Non credo che quel cane seguisse un protocollo.

translation.en: I think he was following his heart.
If anybody ask, I'm following the lead, all right?
translation.it: Se qualcuno lo chiede, sto seguendo la pista, capito?

translation.en: Don't you worry. I'm real good at not telling the police things.
translation.it: Tranquillo. Sono bravo a non parlare con la polizia.

translation.en: [Lyle] Ms. Hughes!
Boat's coming in, Syd.
[Syd] I'm on lookout. Flag him down. He's got the cash for the loot.
translation.it: Sono di guardia. Fagli segno. Ha i soldi per la merce.

translation.en: There's our ride.
Stay.
Carter, I always pretend like I'm not scared,
translation.it: Carter, fingo sempre di non avere paura,

translation.en: but I'm really scared.
I'm really scared.
Please, God.
Please help us get back home.
Please, please, please.
This wasn't open before.
Are you sure?
I'm sure.
[Lyle] Oh, you got to be kidding me.
-[Whitney] What? What is that? -Hey, relax.
It's an underground transport tunnel,
built way back for things you don't even wanna know about.
translation.it: costruito per trasportare cose di cui non vuole sapere nulla.

translation.en: -You think they went... Carter! Frankie! -What you doing?
translation.it: - Crede siano... Carter! Frankie! - Cosa vuole fare?

translation.en: -Those are my kids! -Relax. Listen. We can cut 'em off.
translation.it: - Sono i miei figli! - Si calmi. Taglieremo loro la strada.

translation.en: -There's a river. I'll make a call. Okay? -Okay.
translation.it: - C'è un fiume. Mi lasci telefonare. - D'accordo.

translation.en: -Wait! Give me your keys. -Huh?
-I drive an ambulance for a living. -No.
You call this driving?
Not yet.
[Carter] Benji! Help!
[Frankie] Help us!
[Carter] Help us, Benji! Help!
[man] Here's your money. We leave in five.
translation.it: Ecco i soldi. Partiamo tra cinque minuti.

translation.en: You're not your brother.
My brother thinks I'm stupid.
He thinks he's the boss of me.
translation.it: Crede di potermi dire cosa fare.

translation.en: -But I can make decisions for myself. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Ma so prendere le mie decisioni. - Sì.

translation.en: That's why I'm taking this here cash...
all for me...
and bailin'...
so I don't never have to listen to another thing he says...
translation.it: ...per non dover ascoltare ciò che dice...

translation.en: never again.
Who's ugly now?
Hey, my man! Can you help us out? Have you seen these two kids?
translation.it: Ehi, amico. Puoi aiutarci? Hai visto questi due bambini?

translation.en: A van? Anything out of the ordinary?
No, sir, I never seen 'em.
translation.it: No, non li ho visti, signore.

translation.en: [Frankie faintly] Help! Help!
-That her dog? -Yeah. Whether she knows it or not.
translation.it: - È il suo cane? - Sì, che lo sappia o meno.

translation.en: Okay, I'm requesting backup. I'm at the boatyard, right off...
translation.it: Chiedo rinforzi. Sono in una rimessa vicino...

translation.en: Hey!
-[growling] -It's a little late, you idiot.
Come on, I thought we was friends.
-Gotcha, slick. -[grunts]
You got the right to pretty much nothing.
translation.it: Hai il diritto... Non ne hai praticamente nessuno.

translation.en: [man] Cut the rope, idiot!
[pants] Don't you ever quit?
-[whimpers] -Benji!
You thought that dog was gonna save you?
translation.it: Credevi che il cane vi avrebbe salvati?

translation.en: You're not going anywhere.
-Yeah, we are. -What are you gonna do, big man?
translation.it: - Invece sì. - Cosa vorresti fare, eh?

translation.en: About time.
-Frankie, Carter! -Mommy!
Benji! Benji!
I love you, Benji.
-Benji? Ben? -[whimpers]
He didn't give up.
-Good boy. Good boy. -[Whitney] Benji.
-I love you. -I don’t have to say goodbye.
translation.it: - Ti voglio bene. - Non devo dirgli addio.

translation.en: -[Whitney] Thank God. -Thank you.
-Hi! -[all laughing]
[Syd] Get your hands off me.
[Lyle] Whoa, whoa, whoa. I got him. I got him.
Thank you.
This is going back where it belongs.
Watch your head.
Hello.
Did good today. Good boy.
What you doing?
[chuckles] Oh, I had no idea.
You're a good girl. You're a very good girl.
[mouthing] Thank you.
[Carter] Good boy.
-[Frankie] I'm so glad you're back. -[Carter] We're keeping him, right?
translation.it: - Sono felice di rivederti. - Lo teniamo, vero?

translation.en: -[Whitney sighs] I don't know. -Mom!
[Whitney] We're definitely keeping him.
[Frankie] We're gonna bake cookies and play dress up and you can help me with ballet.
translation.it: Cucineremo, ti metterò dei vestiti e mi aiuterai col balletto.

translation.en: [Carter] Stop. You're scaring him.
